FuncDef: The clock source command configures the clock source selection mode as manual or forcible clock source selection and specifies a clock source to be synchronized. The clock source command configures the clock source selection mode as manual or forcible clock source selection and specifies a clock source to be synchronized. The default clock source selection mode is automatic clock source selection. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H-48S6CQ, CE6881H-48S6CQ-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
